story_26_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What?! The young master went to face Team
Break all by himself?!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Like, what were you thinking?! Why’d you let him
dooo that?
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’m sorry. I couldn’t stop him.
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But we don’t have time to waste! We need to
go after him! Stoutland should be able to track
his scent.
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Honchkrow! Help look for the young master from
the skies!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You help, too, Umbreon! We’re toootally counting
on you!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_0800_10: All right! It’s up to us to save Lear!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Aren’t you all part of Lear’s group? I thought he
promised to go in alone!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_1100_10: You all can play with us for a while out here!
story_26_51000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Whaaat? Seriouslyyy? Do we have to do this, like,
right now?
story_26_51000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Get out of our way! We don’t have time to waste
on the likes of you!
